channel.title: D&D 5e - Place bets on when this will be cancelled [CREATION THREAD]
channel.description:
## For this we are using the core rulebooks, Xanathar's and Volo's (as Mercenary's request)
# Hey epic gamers. Welcome to the epic D&D session GMed by an untrustworthy epic GM.
# combat will also be epicly modified. to make it so that turns are not done in a specific order to make the combat faster paced and more fluid. # higher Initiative will just make thy first to attack. --- # Rulebooks and Help: (Thanks epic Ashe)
## [Player's Handbook](https://thetrove.net/Books/Dungeons%20&%20Dragons/D&D%205th%20Edition/Core/Player%27s%20Handbook.pdf)
#### [5etools (quick reference)](https://5etools.com/)
### Other Base #### [Dungeon Master's Guide](https://thetrove.net/Books/Dungeons%20&%20Dragons/D&D%205th%20Edition/Core/Dungeon%20Master%27s%20Guide.pdf) #### [Monster Manual](https://thetrove.net/Books/Dungeons%20&%20Dragons/D&D%205th%20Edition/Core/Monster%20Manual.pdf)
### Expansions
#### [Xanathar's Guide to Everything](https://thetrove.net/Books/Dungeons%20&%20Dragons/D&D%205th%20Edition/Core/Volo%27s%20Guide%20to%20Monsters.pdf) #### [Volo's Guide to Monsters](https://thetrove.net/Books/Dungeons%20&%20Dragons/D&D%205th%20Edition/Core/Volo%27s%20Guide%20to%20Monsters.pdf)
#### [Volo's Guide to Monsters (Reference for me as I dont own the physical copy)](http://online.anyflip.com/ivdl/runb/mobile/index.html) ---- # Main CS: ### :crossed_swords: = proficiency [details="Main Information"] > **Character Name:** **Class & Level:** **Alignment:** **Race:** **Background:** **Gender:** (can we please not have fettuccine cheese) [/details]
[details="Primary Stats"] > **Current HP / Max HP:** 0/0 > **Armor Class:** 10 > **Proficiency Bonus:** +2 > **Speed:** 30ft > **Initiative:** (Dexterity Modifier) [/details] [details="Skill Stats and Saving Throws"] > ## Skill Stats (Modifier) > **Strength:** 8 (-1) > **Dexterity:** 8 (-1) > **Constitution:** 8 (-1) **Intelligence:** 8 (-1) **Wisdom:** 8 (-1) **Charisma:** 8 (-1) > ## Saving Throws > **Strength:** -1 > **Dexterity:** -1 > **Constitution:** -1 > **Intelligence:** -1 > **Wisdom:** -1 > **Charisma:** -1 [/details] [details="Skills"] > **Athletics (Str):** -1 > > **Acrobatics (Dex):** -1 > **Sleight of Hand (Dex):** -1 > **Stealth (Dex):** -1 > > **Arcana (Int):** -1 > **History (Int):** -1 > **Investigation (Int):** -1 > **Nature (Int):** -1 > **Religion (Int):** -1 > > **Animal Handling (Wis):** -1 > **Insight (Wis):** -1 > **Medicine (Wis):** -1 > **Perception (Wis):** -1 > **Survival (Wis):** -1 > > **Deception (Cha):** -1 > **Intimidation (Cha):** -1 > **Performance (Cha):** -1 > **Persuasion (Cha):** -1 > > **Passive Wisdom (Perception)** - 9 [/details]
[details="Weapons & Attacks"] > ## Attacks: > Bruh sound effect #2 - 1d6 -1 bludgeoning > > ## Ammo: > [/details] [details="Proficiencies, Traits and Abilities"] > ## Proficiencies > **Weapons:** > **Armors:** > **Languages:** Common, > **Tools:** > ## Traits > **Darkvision:** ? > ## Abilities: > [/details] [details="Treasures"] > **CP:** > **SP:** **EP:** **GP:** **PP:** > **Misc:** [/details] [details="Inventory"] > ## Equipped: > > ## Items: > yer items go here ye dingoose [/details] --- ### Signups: 1. Squid 2. BlueStorm 3. Neutral Support 4. Hjasik 5. Margaret 6. Geyde 7. Blizer 8. eevee ___ # Backup: 1. Lights in __
## 6 was max. but I am no longer accepting joins.

item.title: D&D 5e - Place bets on when this will be cancelled [CREATION THREAD]
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
I was on the reddit chat when a guy asked about non-meta combos.
Someone said this out of nothing

I got a weird, but also dumb idea
Imagine: a Classless character. Basically, every time you level up, you roll a d12 and grab an abaility from the class you roll
For example, if you roll a 1 (letâ€™s say thatâ€™s Barbarian) you get Rage, but when you hit level 2, you roll something else and grab a totally different ability
Itâ€™s dumb, but it can lead to some potentially fun or interesting combos.

So I did it. The entire sheet is in portuguese and etc so Iâ€™m not posting unless someone asks for but this is my spell list:

Rules:

  • All spell slots are shared, but if one class can conjurate all spells from their list (ie paladin, cleric), then this slot goes EXCLUSIVELY to the spells of that class
  • Spells known and spells slot gained from a class level are considered, improvement of level 1 features (ie barb rage or rogue dies) are not counted if I didnâ€™t roll the feature at level one.
  • Whenever I learn a magic, I select one from the highest spell slot available of my character that is not exclusive to only one class
Spell list

[ 4 sorcery points ]

CANTRIPS

  • Mage
  • Mage
  • Mage
  • Mage

LEVEL ONE - 2 spells slots at level 1 + 1 spell slot at level 3

  • Mage
  • Mage
  • Mage
  • Mage
  • Mage
  • Mage

LEVEL TWO - 2 spells slots at level 3

  • Mage
  • Mage

LEVEL THREE - 2 spells slots at level 5 + 1 spell slot at level 6

  • Sorcerer
  • Bard

LEVEL FOUR - 1 spell slot at level 7 + 1 spell slot of the Paladin class at level 13

  • Mage
  • Mage

LEVEL FIVE - 1 spell slot at level 10 + 1 spell slot at level 19

  • Bard (Magical Secrets) = Any class
  • Bard (Magical Secrets) = Any class
  • Bard (Magical Secrets) = Any class
  • Bard (Magical Secrets) = Any class

LEVEL SIX - 1 spell slot of the Cleric class at level 11
[nothing]

LEVEL SEVEN
[nothing]

LEVEL EIGHT
[nothing]

LEVEL NINE - 1 spell slot of the Druid class at level 19

IT IS COMPLETLY STUPID AND I LOVE IT.

Read full topic
